steps: Read the file report.json to read the latest scan report
If no issues are found, exit the process else continue
Create a new branch for the run, pull and rebase if needed
collect issues related to secret and make the changes locally first, do not look outside directory /foundation
Run tests, If tests pass continue else fix the issues and run tests again
Run script npm run scan to verify if the changes made have fixed the issues found in report.json
If possible create test cases for the changes made in src files
Create PR with small 1-2 line summary of details of the changes made and title with format BUSINESSCLOUD: <brief description of the fix>
